title: SEC_ERROR_PKCS11_GENERAL_ERROR
content: Buenos dias : Recientemente me he encontrado con el problema de que al intentar acceder a determinados sitios donde es necesaria identificación mediante certificado instalado, me aparece una pagina con mensage de error ( adjunto screen shot de la página). Lo extraño es que esto no ocurría con anterioridad y tampoco pasa con otros navegadores , por lo que deduzco que el problema debe ser de firefox. He mirado posibles soluciones , pero no he dado con ninguna . Gracias
creator: arg5171

title: I don't get beyond login on Firefox browser what can fo?
content: I uninstalled chrome browser and installed Firefox browser, but I log in and it stops there. Shouldn't it take me to other pages? What can I do to use it as my browser?

title: Firefox mise à jour
content: Firefox update failed. When downloading the latest version, a window asks me to choose products from the Microsoft Store and direct me to Microsoft Edge, which I don't want. My browser is Firefox... What should I do? Thank you for the help
creator: jmarbacher

title: Removing nav-bar using userchrome.css crashes firefox
content:
I updated the below code in userchrome.css @namespace url("http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul");

  1. tabbrowser-tabs { visibility: collapse !important; }
  2. nav-bar {visibility: collapse !important;}

browser {margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px ! important;}

==================================

The firefox goes blank when opened, Resizing or maximizing the window refreshes firefox and it loads.

I deleted profile data and it works a couple of times and it happens again. A blank page.
creator: yash292k11

title: CANNOT  SET CUSTOM FILTERS on this site and HOW TO CHANGE the default FILE NAME FOR DL!
content: ADBLOCK CUSTOM FILTERS not working on this site WHAT THE HECK IS THAT AHAH WHAT??? ALSO THIS. After "Refresh"ing Firefox, it now by default saves a file with the page title, not the filename. I can no longer find out how to change this default behaviour (presumably I'd used an addon that has been deleted). This is extremely inconvenient - many archives have large numbers of filenames like "<number>.txt", e.g. "234567.txt", but all with the same title. I don't understand why keeping the old Firefox default was not made an option when you changed to saving by title!
creator: westchester5

title: Different bookmarks in different profiles in same account
content: I'd like to have, in my one firefox account, a 'private' profile with my private life bookmarks and a 'work' profile with my work life bookmarks. However, this doesn't seem to work. I open firefox with work profile and see my work bookmarks, then I close and reopen with private profile and see my private bookmarks, then I close and reopen again with work profile and now I still see my private bookmarks instead of my work bookmarks. Firefox just unsolicitedly takes the private bookmarks over to the work profile. This can't be how it's supposed to be, right? Because what would be the point of having different profiles? I hope you can help me with this.
creator: lop192

title: All date from firefox gone after reset
content:
So i just gave my PC a reset which i do every 6 months and had to reinstall everything, upon reinstalling Firefox i logged in and forgot my password and had to reset it. And when i logged it all my Saved passwords and bookmarks were not there anymore even after sync. What do i do and get all my data back. Cause i am sure my firefox syncs itself every now and then.

and i also have the SGT backup thing in my downloads if it can help
creator: jolzevolt

title: How to avoid Mozilla Firefox Critical ERROR
content: Hello Everyone, last day suddenly when I was working. I got a solid red screen alert on Mozilla Firefox, which says FIREFOX CRITICAL ERROR and says that someone tried to get access to my personal account. Adding with my personnel data that was stored on hard disk is also in danger. . So, I shocked up and at that moment the only thing I can do was ran a scan with Windows Defender, but it did not fix the problem. Kindly help me out with what steps or suggestion I need to apply. Thanks in Advance Regards: Eva Abion
creator: aboineva

title: Firefox browser not recognized by many sites.
content: When I go to websites i.e. PayPal, Facebook, eBay, amazon, etc I get emails saying that I used an unknown browser that I have not used before. This started with your new update 90.0.2 64 bit. I am not technically savvy what do I do to stop these emails and let them know it is fire fox mozilla browser. Fire fox is my main browser and has been for years but, unless there is some way to let websites know this is a new update to fire fox Mozilla I will be forced to remove this browser from my computer. Please advise me what I can do. Thank you. Katisam3@cox.net
creator: Katisam3

title: Pocket install asks to confirm non-existant email address and no way to change
content:
I upgraded to V90.0.2 and tried to install Pocket. The popup gave me an old email address that does not exist, so I changed it to my current email address, logged in, but then pocket said it needed to use my email address, but the old email address was in the box and there was no way to change my old email address.

I came here and logged in using my old email address, but I had updated the account so it had my new email address. I logged out and logged in with my new email address, and my settings were the same, with my new email address and my new alternate email address.

No where was my old email address listed for me to change or delete. I see no way to tell FF that email no longer exists. Confusing, I know.
creator: cglenn

title: Restoring Browsing History
content: I have already asked this question and has gotten the same solution as (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1290163) and it doesn't make any sense. I am on Firefox version 90.0.2 (20210721174149), and would love if someone could give me a solution that makes sense, works, and isn't a copy-paste of another answer. (Sorry if I sound rude, I'm just very annoyed.)
creator: amweissberg

title: After updating from 89.0.2 to 90.0.2, FireFox browser cannot open ANY webpage on Mac (shows only blank page)
content:
After updating from 89.0.2 to 90.0.2, FireFox browser cannot open ANY webpage. Occurs on a 2017 iMac both in OSX 10.14.6 and also OSX 11.4 after upgrade. (Also, “Checking for updates…” in “About Firefox” never connects, just spins.) No additional security apps, firewalls, VPNs, etc. are running.

Have tried REFRESH and other troubleshooting Mozilla troubleshooting protocols. No problems with all other browsers (Safari, Chrome, Seamonkey).
creator: jpaxson

title: Restoring Browsing History
content: I accidentally deleted all of my youtube browsing history, and can't find a single way to restore it. I am on Firefox version 90.0.2 (20210721174149), and if anyone could help me that would be great! (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1290163 isn't of any help)

title: address bar search

title: Old version failed to update, downloaded new version did not update existing but create additional firefox
content: My 89 version failed to update, when I downloaded and installed a new version of firefox, it did not update the old version, instead it install another firefox into my windows 10. Now I got two firefox in my computer, the old one with all my customisation and a new one which are clueless about the old one. How do I resolve this?
creator: yappyml

title: Inspect Page Info Media - Image Distorting from Dimensions Scaling
content:
Previously inspecting the page info (Ctrl + I) and going to the media tab, I could select an image and download it in its original file size. This has changed to where the image is now downsized, even when opening the direct link in a new tab. The image comes out squished and distorted.

Is there a fix for this? I've tried clearing all cookies & cache which has worked in the past but not anymore.
creator: nilcaho

content:
